name: doctortc
title: DoctoRTC.js
description: A JavaScript library that checks browser's WebRTC support and performs bandwidth calculation among other features such as network connectivity checks (with the help of a TURN server).
author: Iñaki Baz Castillo at eFace2Face, inc. <mailto:inaki.baz@eface2face.com>
